name: What Did You Say?
description: In this game, the computer tries to spell a word before you can. You have 3 lives that will be lost if you guess the wrong word, but will be regained if you guess the correct word.  Thanks to my genetic algorithm, no 2 games will be the same, especially with the customisable difficulty, so you can change the vital components of the algorithm to make it as hard or as easy as you want.
